text:
It's crazy how this game's box art itself seems to bring back memories from the entire game! I can just picture everything in my mind, even though I didn't play for such a long time...

The Hippopotamus with the bubbles... the 3 little pigs of different shapes, the giant Mario doll with all the toys, the Halloween levels and the space levels with all the stars...

What a great game! (^^)
